description.value: If Osterneth takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn't function until the end of her next turn.

Necrotic

Aura 5

Any living enemy that enters or starts its turn within the aura takes 20 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

+34 vs AC; the target gains ongoing 15 necrotic damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+32 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 necrotic damage.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+32 vs Fortitude; the target is stunned (save ends). First Failed Saving Throw: The target loses 1d4 healing surges and is stunned (save ends both). Second Failed Saving Throw: The target dies and its soul is trapped within one of Osterneth's soul gems. Osterneth can have up to six souls trapped in her soul gems at any time. A body made soulless by this attack is reduced to dust.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic, Lightning

Standard

Ranged 20

+32 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 necrotic and lightning damage, and the target is dazed (save ends), and Osterneth makes a secondary attack. Miss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed. Secondary Targets: Two creatures within 5 squares of the primary target.

Secondary Attack +28 vs Reflex; (each)2d8+7 necrotic and lightning damage each.

Recharge 6

Ranged 5

+32 vs Will; the target is dominated and takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Charm

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Close burst 10

Targets one creature; +33 vs Will; the target is pulled 4 squares.

At-Will ✦ Illusion

Minor

Osterneth can alter her physical form to take on the appearance and smell of any Medium humanoid, including a unique individual. A successful Insight check (opposed by Osterneth's Bluff check) pierces the illusion.

The soul gems contain the spirits of Osterneth's victims. At the beginning of an encounter, the soul gems contain three souls. Crushing a gem after Osterneth is defeated releases the soul to the Shadowfell.

Trigger: When reduced to 0 hit points

Osterneth crumbles to dust, but she is not destroyed unless her phylactery is found and also destroyed. She reappears in one day adjacent to her phylactery.

system.biography:
HP 993; Bloodied 496
Regeneration 20 (if Osterneth takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn’t function until the end of her next turn)
Resist 10 cold, 10 lightning, 15 necrotic, 10 psychic Immune disease, poison 		Init +22 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 45Fort 39Ref 44Will 44
Speed 6, fly 10 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 21 (+19)
Con 25 (+21)		Dex 26 (+22)
Int 31 (+24)		Wis 24 (+21)
Cha 28 (+23)
Languages Common, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +28, Intimidate +28, Religion +29, Stealth +27, Thievery +27Senses Darkvision,Truesight 10
Passive Perception 31 | Insight 31
